articles.description: Lenovo has launched one of Indias first AI-powered gaming laptop, which is powered by Intels top-end Core i9-13980HX processor and up to NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 GPU. The laptop comes in at Rs 4,49,990 in a Carbon Black variant
articles.content: Lenovo has introduced the Legion 9i gaming laptop in India, featuring cutting-edge technology and innovative specifications. Marketed as the “gaming studio in your backpack,” the laptop is equipped w… [+2014 chars]

articles.author: Rajni Pandey
articles.title: NASA to Send 'MAGGIE' to Mars in Search of Water: Read Details - Times Now
articles.description: NASA is going to look for water on Mars in a groundbreaking mission with a pioneering aircraft named Mars Aerial and Ground Intelligent Explorer, also known as MAGGIE.
